mapper.select: select to_char(a.user_id) user_id, a.user_name, a.phone_number, to_char(a.weixin_id) weixin_id, a.user_password, a.store_name, b.eparchy_code, b.city_code from AUR_D_AUTHINFO a, aur_d_baseinfo b where a.phone_number = #{phone_number} and a.user_id = b.user_id

select b.bss_login_code, b.bss_login_pwd, b.cbss_login_code, b.cbss_login_pwd, b.developer_code, b.developer_name, b.channel_code, b.channel_name from aur_d_busiinfo b where b.phone_number = #{phone_number}

select b.bss_login_code, b.bss_login_pwd, b.cbss_login_code, b.cbss_login_pwd, b.developer_code, b.developer_name, b.channel_code, b.channel_name from sys_p_busiinfo b where b.city_code = #{city_code}
